tool.name: Reclassify Grid Values
tool.description: The tool can be used to reclassify the values of a grid. It provides three different options:<br/>(a) reclassification of single values<br/>(b) reclassification of a range of values<br/>(c) reclassification of value ranges specified in a lookup table<br/><br/>In addition to these methods, two special cases (NoData values and values not included in the reclassification setup) are supported.<br/>With reclassification mode (a) and (b), the 'NoData option' is evaluated before the 'Method' settings. In reclassification mode (c) the option is evaluated only if the NoData value is not included in the lookup table.<br/>The 'other values' option is always evaluated after checking the 'Method' settings.<br/><br/>The tool allows one to define the NoData value of the output grid (header): by default, the output grid gets assigned the NoData value of the input grid. But it is also possible to assign a user defined NoData value.<br/><br/>

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid to reclassify

param.name: METHOD
param.label: Method
param.help: Select the desired method: 1. a single value or a range defined by a single value is reclassified, 2. a range of values is reclassified, 3. the lookup table is used to reclassify the grid.

param.name: OLD
param.label: old value
param.help: Value to reclassify.

param.name: NEW
param.label: new value
param.help: New value.

param.name: SOPERATOR
param.label: operator
param.help: Select the desired operator (<;.;=; >;.); it is possible to define a range above or below the old value.

param.name: MIN
param.label: minimum value
param.help: Minimum value of the range to be reclassified.

param.name: MAX
param.label: maximum value
param.help: Maximum value of the range to be reclassified.

param.name: RNEW
param.label: new value
param.help: new value

param.name: ROPERATOR
param.label: operator
param.help: Select operator: eg. min < value < max.

param.name: RETAB
param.label: Lookup Table
param.help: Lookup table used in method "table"

param.name: TOPERATOR
param.label: operator
param.help: Select the desired operator (min < value < max; min . value < max; min .value . max; min < value . max).

param.name: RETAB_2
param.label: Lookup Table
param.help: Lookup table used in method "user supplied table"

param.name: F_MIN
param.label: minimum value
param.help: minimum value

param.name: F_MAX
param.label: maximum value
param.help: maximum value

param.name: F_CODE
param.label: new value
param.help: new value

param.name: NODATAOPT
param.label: no data values
param.help: Use this option to reclassify No-Data values independently of the method settings.

param.name: NODATA
param.label: new value
param.help: new value

param.name: OTHEROPT
param.label: other values
param.help: Use this option to reclassify all other values that are not specified in the options above.

param.name: OTHERS
param.label: new value
param.help: new value

param.name: RESULT_NODATA_CHOICE
param.label: Assign ...
param.help: Choose how to handle the NoData value of the output grid.

param.name: RESULT_NODATA_VALUE

param.help: User defined NoData value for output grid.
